name: The Maze Getaway
description:
You play as the getaway driver who has to navigate randomly-generated maze to get yourself to the exit while evading other cars and pursuers. The drive will get harder as time goes by, so you will need to master the skills to understand and predict the movement of others so that you can escape.

You start by learning how to drive at the driving school, and then move on to the village, suburb, town and city surrounding as the levels get harder and harder.

The game has two (2) modes; Normal Mode and Greed Mode.

Normal Mode: Story Mode. Try as many times as you can to complete levels by escaping through the exit at the end. Collect coins on the way if possible. Unlock levels using the money earned.

Greed Mode: Hardcore Arcade Mode. Using one life, complete levels by collecting as many coins as you can that will respawn one after another before escaping through the exit. You also have limited fuel but can be replenished by buying at the shop. Unlock levels using the money earned.
